Text: Thanks for this great upload. Works like a charm, without any glitches. Now I can use my Canon Lide30 scanner - pretty old model, needs Windows XP to work. Now I can use it on my Windows 7 computer, don't need to buy a new scanner. Really appreciate it. More power to your other great uploads!!

Works great on my friend's Canon CanoScan LIDE 20 on Windows 7 64-bit! For two days I was trying to force Canon win7 drivers to work on Win7 64-bit and nothing. Now it's ok with VueScan ($39.95). AVG antivirus goes nuts when I started crack, but it's false alarm as it identifies it as Generic bla bla bla trojan. -=>Thanks, Anacondaz!!
